name: SecondTurnComplete
commands: As for your other keys to press, the most important are 'z' and 'c'.|C is the more information button. You can press c on units, items, and attributes to get more info on them. Try it out!|The 'z' button is the back button. You can press z to cancel an action.

That's all for the basics! When you're ready to continue, move your character to the castle entrance and press <green>Seize</green>.|In the future if you ever come back to this tutorial, you can skip ahead by directly seizing.|If you're ever lost in a chapter, refer to the top right of the screen for your objective.|You can also press z to skip some dialogue as well.
